channel.title: MBallSectionsDR
channel.description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from MBallSectionsDR, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: Report: Riot-Ravaged L.A. Paid Out $1.1 Billion In Overtime Hours Last Year
item.description: Five city employees last year made more than the $400,000 annual salary of the president of the United States, according to the OTB report.

item.title: Gavin’s Last Gasp
item.description: A dramatic showdown with Trump is Gavin Newsom’s only remaining path to the 2028 Democratic nomination — and relevance.

item.title: Republicans in deficit dispute with Congress' budget referee
item.description: The nonpartisan federal agency that analyzes legislation for Congress has been a real downer for the GOP as it tries to pass President Trump's mega ta...

item.title: If NYC Elects A Far-Left Socialist, Blame Ranked-Choice Voting
item.description: New York City could sleepwalk its way into electing a socialist mayor, thanks to ranked-choice voting.

item.title: Bunker Hill: The Battle That Made America Possible
item.description: For one bloody day, New England militia were the nation’s first army.

item.title: Trump slams 'publicity seeking' French President Macron for comments about Iran-Israel conflict
item.description: President Trump said early Tuesday in a social media post that French President Emmanuel Macron "always gets it wrong," blasting the European leader f...

item.title: Documents Show Biden Admin Ginned Up FBI Investigations Of Law-Abiding Political Opponents
item.description: Trump should immediately issue an executive order dismantling Biden's National Strategy for Countering Domestic Terrorism.

item.title: Park Service Wrongly Celebrates Juneteenth As ‘National Independence Day’
item.description: The rhetoric around Juneteenth celebrations is clearly intended to compete with and marginalize the Fourth of July.

item.title: Factories of Progress
item.description: Policies that hinder globalization and reduce trade are policies that decrease global prosperity and increase global poverty.

item.title: The Rioter’s White Hood
item.description: The face mask is now part of the kit of rioters, as useful, indispensable, and emblematic as a Klansman’s white hood.

item.title: Trump leaves G7 earlier than expected
item.description: President Trump decided to leave the Group of Seven summit Monday night, a day earlier than scheduled, and return to Washington due to the escalating ...

item.title: It’s Time For Trump To Play Hardball With Qatar
item.description: President Trump has the leverage over Qatar. He must use it to demand accountability and insist on transparency.

item.title: Trump, Starmer use G7 summit to finalize trade deal announced in May

item.title: What Trump Still Doesn’t Grasp About Radical Islam — and Iran
item.description: His weekend posts about Iran and Israel avoid reality.
